title: UAE Year of
description: Welcome to the Year of Sustainability. Sustainability is about protecting our land, resources and one another today, for a better tomorrow.

title: R Qitects
description: Premier design studio and architecture company in the UAE. Enhance your projects with our top architects, leading the way in innovative and timeless design solutions.

title: FINTX
description: FINTX is the fintech arm of the Emirates Post Group, with the vision of building a fintech ecosystem for the UAE & beyond.

title: G42
description: G42 is a technology group that invents visionary artificial intelligence for a better everyday. Born in Abu Dhabi and operating across the world, we champion AI as a powerful force for good across industries and societies.

title: Ferronato Swiss
description: In a world of data theft and device tracking, FERRONATO is the first luxury accessories range to combine privacy technology with handcrafted Italian design.

title: Luxury X
description: Luxury X, a holding company that specializes in communications for the most luxury of brands. We generate bespoke creative communications for our brands with a common vision to add the X factor, which we describe as a classy, contemporary luxe twist. We work with a list of exclusive brands across the globe that share our passion to push creative and artistic boundaries for the richest outcomes. Our goal is singular, but shared across our portfolio.

title: MSA'nin Restorani
description: Since 2004, MSA, The Culinary Arts Academy of Istanbul has been delivering professional education programs.

title: Denge Bilgisayar
description: All over the country with widespread distribution network and world brands.

title: Fareya Azfar Araoui
description: Arbitration and Private Capital law firm with a boutique based in Abu Dhabi serving globally with a cross-disciplinary expertise of industry specialists.

title: Bull & Bear
description: Bull & Bear, Award-winning signature restaurant , the acclaimed signature steakhouse of Waldorf Astoria DIFC, is an exquisite culinary masterpiece that transcends the traditional meat eatery. Book Now at Bull & Bear Waldorf Astoria
